label: Standard
comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.

datatypeProperties.comment: The identifier of the agency for this referenced standard.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
The identifier of the version of a specific element within the referenced standard, such as the version of a data element.
The identifier of a part of this referenced standard, such as a section or topic.

referencedBy.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A referenced standard associated to this specified licence.
A referenced inspection standard for this specified inspection result.
A referenced standard related to this specified certification.
